line.text: Against my love shall be as I am now
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With Time injurious hand crushed and oerworn
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When hours have drained his blood and filled his brow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With lines and wrinkles when his youthful morn
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Hath travelled on to age steepy night
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And all those beauties whereof now he king
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Are vanishing or vanished out of sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Stealing away the treasure of his spring
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For such a time do I now fortify
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That he shall never cut from memory
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My sweet love beauty though my lover life
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: His beauty shall in these black lines be seen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And they shall live and he in them still green
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
